Registration Form

Some of the required fields does not have valid value.


Form Data

First Name: {{ firstname }}

Last Name: {{ lastname }}

Email: {{ email }}

Country: {{ country }}

Gender: {{ gen }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'reactive-forms'; }
